h1_title: Chapter 4 Secret - Purple Cloud Mountain Walkthrough
content: There's a lengthy moat nearby leading under a bridge, but aside from several Croaky enemies and some green Wisps, you can't exit out the other side.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_4_Secret-Purple_Cloud_Mountain_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 4 Secret - Purple Cloud Mountain Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Petalfall Hamlet'.
The content is as follows:
There's a lengthy moat nearby leading under a bridge, but aside from several Croaky enemies and some green Wisps, you can't exit out the other side.
